feed.title: Infisical Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.125.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Block user on crossing the identity limit by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3427
  • Fix SecretVersionV2 reference issue blocking users and identities deletion by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3456
  • Allow user to remove SAML config by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3458
  • misc: moved regex use to re2 by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3457
  • Improvement: Improve SQL Connection Validation Error Propogation by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3460
  • fix: stuck on saml sso creation page by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3462
  • Removed low entropy password regexes that threw false positives by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3461
  • feat: removed banner on ui for subscription crossing by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3468
  • Fix: Correct Enterprise Plan Display by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3463
  • Hide non public endpoints in swagger by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3455
  • docs: add Winget install docs by @maidul98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3473
  • misc: reordered kube auth not found check by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3469
  • Moved certificate manager overview tabs to left sidebar by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3459
  • feat(api): implemented secret caching version 2 by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3475
  • improvement(kms): return kms key id in project response by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3451
  • Adding a guide on deploying Infisical using Google Cloud Run by @0xArshdeep in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3450
  • Fix: Filter Out Deleted Imports with Replication by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3477
  • Update the organization structure guide to include organizations and â€¦ by @0xArshdeep in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3479
  • Updated doc to have europe infisical aws account id by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3443
  • Admin SSO bypass (break-glass login) sends out email to all org admins + creates audit log by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3472
  • fix(delete-project): Add tooltip for delete project button when it has protection enabled by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3481
  • docs: added new docs for infisical package installation instructions by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/2718
  • fix(kms): better error logs by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3485
  • fix(dynamic-secret): improve error propagation and add FAQ to docs by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3484
  • feat: add user get token CLI and revamp session management by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3489
  • feat(auth): Persist pre-login-redirect path and redirect after login by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3490
  • Improvements to Infisical V2: Support for Non-Interactive Mode, Updating Default SSH CAs. by @dangtony98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3446
  • feat(project-members): Persist pagination setting and add role filtering by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3480
  • feat(secret-rotation-v2): Add AWS IAM User Secret rotation by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3470
  • feat(secret-sync): TeamCity App Connection & Secret Sync by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3476
  • improvement(app-connections): Improve AWS Connection Error Propagation by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3493
  • Feature: LDAP Connection and Password Rotation by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3452

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.124.0-postgres...infisical/v0.125.0-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.125.1-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix KMS memory leak by @maidul98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3501
  • Infisical SSH: Add Alias Field to SSH Hosts by @dangtony98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3497
  • Implemented project permission impersonation by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3447
  • feat(reminders): specify recipients by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3453
  • feat(project-permissions): allow users to sort permissions on the UI by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3494
  • feat: github org sync by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3498
  • feat: enabled sso (google, gitlab, github) to bypass org sso by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3471
  • feat(login): Update all SSO login methods to use PKCE by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3495
  • feat: increased secret caching to 10mins with jitter of 2min by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3505
  • feat: add support for eddsa jwt alg for oidc by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3503

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.125.0-postgres...infisical/v0.125.1-postgres
